original_title: Nations Trust Bank American Express unveils the ‘Most Wonderful Time of the Year’
original_body_lines: Nations Trust Bank American Express is ushering in the festive spirit with an array of savings and benefits, transforming this season into ‘The Most Wonderful Time of the Year’ for Cardmembers. The bank’s exclusive seasonal campaign spans categories including retail shopping, dining experiences, hotel stays, supermarket shopping, and travel benefits both locally and overseas.

Embracing the theme ‘The Most Wonderful Time of the Year,’ Nations Trust Bank aims to make the festive season extra special for its Cardmembers. As the year comes to a close and the season unfolds, the focus shifts to connecting with friends and creating meaningful moments with family. The American Express seasonal offerings provide a plethora of festive benefits, making it easier for Cardmembers to navigate gift shopping, relish dining experiences, and embark on a well-deserved year-end holiday with family.

Nations Trust Bank’s American Express endeavours to go beyond mere savings, emphasising the creation of meaningful experiences during the holiday season. The festive initiative highlights the bank’s commitment to ensuring that this time of the year is not just about financial savings but also about fostering unforgettable moments. To explore the exclusive offers and savings available until the end of the year, visit https://www.americanexpress.lk/ .

Nations Trust Bank PLC serves a diverse range of customers across Consumer, Commercial, and Corporate segments through multi-channel customer touchpoints in both physical and digital realms. The bank is at the forefront of digital empowerment, leveraging cutting-edge digital banking technologies. It is the issuer and sole acquirer of American Express Cards in Sri Lanka, holding market leadership in the premium segments.
